294499699325534200,Thu Jan 24 17:39:34 +0000 2013,.@Lin_Dolin If you include part-timers & people who've given up, the US unemployment rate is 14.4% (more) #TheGreatReset
294496479228358660,Thu Jan 24 17:26:46 +0000 2013,.@Nik_Farr Yea, surfboards are the answer -- if you can find ones sitll made by humans. Checking now for you. #TheGreatReset
294495984195600400,Thu Jan 24 17:24:48 +0000 2013,@Lin_Dolin In Spain, housing prices are still dropping, unlike in US. So problem there (and in Greece) is compounded by this. #TheGreatReset
294494532198862850,Thu Jan 24 17:19:02 +0000 2013,.@Nik_Farr ...not to mention your kids. They love their iPhone, iPads, Netflix. And more robots=cheaper prices. No going back.#TheGreatReset
